00039 ostream* os_ = 0;
00040 
00041 
00042 void testMassAbundance()
00043 {
00044     using namespace Chemistry;
00045     MassAbundance ma(1, 2);
00046     MassAbundance ma2(1, 4);
00047     unit_assert(ma != ma2);
00048     ma2.abundance = 2;
00049     unit_assert(ma == ma2);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 void testFormula()
00054 {
00055     using namespace Chemistry;
00056 
00057     Formula formula("C1H 2N3O4 S5");
00058     unit_assert(formula[Element::C] == 1);
00059     unit_assert(formula[Element::H] == 2);
00060     unit_assert(formula[Element::N] == 3);
00061     unit_assert(formula[Element::O] == 4);
00062     unit_assert(formula[Element::S] == 5);
00063 
00064     unit_assert(round(formula.monoisotopicMass()) == 280);
00065     unit_assert((int)formula.molecularWeight() == 280);
00066     if (os_) *os_ << formula << " " << formula.monoisotopicMass() << " " << formula.molecularWeight() << endl;
00067 
00068     formula[Element::C] = 6;
00069     unit_assert(round(formula.monoisotopicMass()) == 340);
00070     unit_assert((int)formula.molecularWeight() == 340);
00071     if (os_) *os_ << formula << " " << formula.monoisotopicMass() << " " << formula.molecularWeight() << endl;
00072 
00073     //const Formula& constFormula = formula;
00074     //constFormula[Element::C] = 1; // this won't compile, by design 
00075 
00076     // test copy constructor and operator!=
00077     Formula formula2 = formula;
00078     formula2[Element::C] = 1;
00079     unit_assert(round(formula.monoisotopicMass()) == 340);
00080     unit_assert(round(formula2.monoisotopicMass()) == 280);
00081     if (os_) *os_ << "formula: " << formula << endl;
00082     if (os_) *os_ << "formula2: " << formula2 << endl;
00083 
00084     // test operator= and operator==
00085     formula2 = formula;
00086     unit_assert(round(formula.monoisotopicMass()) == 340);
00087     unit_assert(round(formula2.monoisotopicMass()) == 340);
00088     if (os_) *os_ << "formula: " << formula << endl;
00089     if (os_) *os_ << "formula2: " << formula2 << endl;
00090 
00091     // test data()
00092 
00093     Formula::Map data = formula.data();
00094     if (os_) *os_ << "map: "; 
00095     for (Formula::Map::iterator it=data.begin(), end=data.end(); it!=end; ++it)
00096         if (os_) *os_ << it->first << it->second << " ";
00097 
00098     if (os_) *os_ << "\n";
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 void testFormulaOperations()
00103 {
00104     using namespace Chemistry; 
00105     using namespace Element; 
00106 
00107     Formula water("H2O1");
00108     Formula a("C1 H2 N3 O4 S5");
00109 
00110     a *= 2;
00111     unit_assert(a[C]==2 && a[H]==4 && a[N]==6 && a[O]==8 && a[S]==10);
00112     a += water;
00113     unit_assert(a[H]==6 && a[O]==9);
00114     a -= water;
00115     unit_assert(a[C]==2 && a[H]==4 && a[N]==6 && a[O]==8 && a[S]==10);
00116     a += 2*water;
00117     unit_assert(a[H]==8 && a[O]==10);
00118     a = (a - water*2);
00119     unit_assert(a[C]==2 && a[H]==4 && a[N]==6 && a[O]==8 && a[S]==10);
00120     a = water + water;
00121     unit_assert(a[H]==4 && a[O]==2);
00122     if (os_) *os_ << "water: " << a-water << endl;
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00126 void testInfo()
00127 {
00128     using namespace Chemistry;
00129     Element::Info info;
00130 
00131     if (os_)
00132     {
00133         for (Element::Type e=Element::H; e<=Element::Ca; e=(Element::Type)(e+1))
00134             *os_ << info[e].symbol << " " << info[e].atomicNumber << endl;
00135         *os_ << endl;
00136     }
00137 }
00138

00140 void infoExample()
00141 {
00142     using namespace Chemistry;
00143     using namespace Element;
00144 
00145     Info info;
00146    
00147     if (os_)
00148     {
00149         *os_ << "Sulfur isotopes: " << info[S].isotopes.size() << endl
00150              << info[S].isotopes;
00151     }
00152 }

00155 void testPolysiloxane()
00156 {
00157     using namespace Chemistry;
00158 
00159     Formula formula("Si6C12H36O6");
00160 
00161     if (os_) 
00162     {
00163         *os_ << "polysiloxane:\n"
00164              << formula << " " 
00165              << formula.monoisotopicMass() << " " 
00166              << formula.molecularWeight() << endl
00167              << "ion: " << Ion::mz(formula.monoisotopicMass(), 1) << endl;
00168     }
00169 }

00172 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00173 {
00174 
00175     try
00176     {
00177         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00178         if (os_) *os_ << "ChemistryTest\n" << setprecision(12);
00179         testMassAbundance();
00180         testFormula();
00181         testFormulaOperations();
00182         testInfo();
00183         infoExample();
00184         testPolysiloxane();
00185         return 0;
00186     }
00187     catch (exception& e)
00188     {
00189         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00190         return 1;
00191     }
00192 }
